channel.title: alexanderell.is on c13u's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in alexanderell.is on c13u's Blog

item.title: Against 'Smart' Clipboard Adjustments
item.description: Don’t touch my clipboard [Alex Ellis] [] Complaint: Alex selected & copied an em dash ( - ) character from https://www.thepunctuationguide.com/em-dash.html, but here’s what the site put into the clipboard: 1 2 3 4 — From https://www.thepunctuationguide.com/em-dash.html © 2020 thepunctuationguide.com There’s a tradeoff between attribution and changing things outside a site’s scope. Apple’s iBooks does this too. It may be due to contractual agreements with publishers. []
